description:
In order to accomodate for chassis swaps and/or emergency migrations, cells and scheduler should allow a configurable option for minimum spare hosts.

Currently, resource scheduling completely fills each cell and there is no way to recover from these situations.
title: Scheduler and Cells need minimum reserved hosts
